name: Interactive Data Visualization
description: A WebGL-powered data visualization platform that renders complex datasets in 3D space with interactive controls.

name: VR Product Showcase
description: A virtual reality product showcase allowing users to interact with 3D models of products in immersive environments.

name: Procedural Terrain Generator
description: A tool for generating realistic 3D terrains with adjustable parameters for height, erosion, and biome distribution.

name: Physics Playground
description: An interactive physics sandbox with realistic simulations of rigid bodies, soft bodies, and fluid dynamics.

name: Collaborative Whiteboard
description: A real-time collaborative whiteboard application with vector drawing tools and 3D object placement.

name: Particle System Demo
description: A GPU-accelerated particle system demonstrating various effects like fire, smoke, and fluid simulations.
